Remove Shared Variables

drop_shared_variables.Rd

Variables are considered shared if they have the same variable name

drop_shared_variables(x, y, keep)

Arguments

x

a data.frame
y

a data.frame
keep

optional, a vector with variable names that should not be removed

Value

a data.frame

Examples


drop_shared_variables(iris, iris[, 1:3])
#>     Petal.Width    Species
